description: A crispy dish made with kangkong leaves, coated in a batter and fried.
instructions: MIX egg, cornstarch and TASTY BOY® (Regular) in a small bowl. COAT kangkong leaves evenly with mixed batter. COMBINE mayonnaise, mustard and ground pepper and set aside. FRY in oil the kangkong leaves with temperature of 175˚C until kangkong is cooked. SERVE and enjoy.
notes: You can also use alugbati and spinach leaves for this dish.
